Title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
Description:
This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.
GA date: January CY2024
